description: This is the main Flutter app entry point that sets up a basic UI with a Scaffold, AppBar, and centered loading indicator, representing a template project with a placeholder title.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the main screen with a customizable title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the Scaffold with an AppBar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point function that runs the Flutter application.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState that defines their widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for MyHomePage widget.
